com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib

Class AGroupNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupNetwork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientGroupNetwork, ServerGroupNetwork

    public abstract class AGroupNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as cover over UDP multicast communication. It enables to easily send messages and files to other clients. There are two types of GroupNetwork - HostGroupNetwork and ClientGroupNetwork Clients usually send all important messages to host, who sends them to all clients. Host keeps and updates info about network, its users and their "ping" to him. Group IP(224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255)
